passage_text: Over the Edge. Over the Edge is a coming-of-age drama film directed by Jonathan Kaplan released in 1979. Due to the negative publicity surrounding a wave of recent youth gang films such as The Warriors, Boulevard Nights and The Wanderers, Over the Edge had a limited theatrical release in November 1979.

over the edge. into a condition of extreme emotional or mental suffering I worry that someone as upset as she is could easily be pushed over the edge and cause herself great harm. See also: edge, over, the.

push/drive somebody over the edge. if an unpleasant event pushes someone over the edge, it makes them start to behave in a crazy way She had been driven over the edge by the separation from her husband.
